2048

Swipe-and-merge numbers until you reach 2048 (or beyond).

Tesla vs Platform comparison

Tesla version

  • Available in Tesla Arcade
  • Classic 4×4 board.
  • Controller required: No
  • Local co-op: No
  • No controller needed.

Where to buy / play at home

  • GOG
  • Humble Store
  • Steam
PlatformAvailableKey perks / differences
Tesla Yes No controller needed.
PC Yes Variants and larger boards
Xbox No —
PlayStation No —
Switch Yes Portable play
Mobile Yes Free, lightweight apps on iOS/Android

Cross-saves

  • Tesla → home export supported: No
  • No Tesla → home export.

Features

  • Local co-op: No
  • Online co-op (native): No
  • Controller recommended: No

Notes

  • Great idle puzzle; home versions offer modes and themes.
